alert.note: Alert for Nantucket (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Coastal Flood Advisory issued September 16 at 9:04AM EDT until September 16 at 4:00PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...COASTAL FLOOD ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 4 PM EDT THIS AFTERNOON... ...HIGH SURF ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 AM EDT SUNDAY... ...COASTAL FLOOD WARNING IS CANCELLED... * WHAT...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, minimal inundation above ground level in low-lying areas near shorelines and tidal waterways (3.4 to 3.6 feet Mean Lower Low Water). For the High Surf Advisory, large breaking waves of 4 to 8 feet in the surf zone. * WHERE...Nantucket MA County. * WHEN...For the Coastal Flood Advisory, until 4 PM EDT this afternoon. For the High Surf Advisory, until 8 AM EDT Sunday. * IMPACTS...Flooding of lots, parks, and roads with only isolated road closures expected. Dangerous swimming and surfing conditions and localized beach erosion. && Time of high total tides are approximate to the nearest hour. Nantucket Harbor MLLW Categories - Minor 5.0 ft, Moderate 6.5 ft, Major 8.0 ft MHHW Categories - Minor 1.4 ft, Moderate 2.9 ft, Major 4.4 ft Total Total Departure Day/Time Tide Tide from Norm Waves Flood ft MLLW ft MHHW ft ft Impact -------- --------- --------- --------- ------- -------- 16/01 PM 3.5/ 4.0 -0.2/ 0.3 0.6/ 1.1 7-9 None 17/02 AM 2.1/ 2.6 -1.6/-1.1 -1.0/-0.5 4 None 17/02 PM 2.8/ 3.4 -0.8/-0.2 -0.2/ 0.2 2-3 None 18/03 AM 3.0/ 3.5 -0.7/-0.2 0.1/ 0.6 2 None 18/03 PM 3.5/ 4.0 -0.2/ 0.3 0.2/ 0.8 1-2 None &&
info.instruction: If travel is required, allow extra time as some roads may be closed. Do not drive around barricades or through water of unknown depth. Take the necessary actions to protect flood-prone property. Inexperienced swimmers should remain out of the water due to dangerous surf conditions.
